items.title: Microsoft’s Robot White/Carbon Black Xbox controllers hit lowest rates since official price hike at $40, new Breaker series at $60
items.summary:
As part of its now live early Black Friday sale, Best Buy is offering Microsoft’s Xbox Wireless Controller for $39.99 shipped. You can get this gamepad in a bunch of different finishes, but only the Robot White and Carbon Black models are down to the $40 mark today. These controllers have largely been selling at full price since their cost jumped to $65 earlier this year, but today’s deal knocks $25 off, landing them back at their lowest price since the price hike. It’s a great time to cash in and snag these controllers if you were planning to pick them up for multiplayer action during the holiday season. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: Tenways launches new Wayfarer e-bike with 85-mile range, Apple Find My, and $577 savings at $1,899
items.summary:
Running alongside its ongoing Early Black Friday Sale, Tenways has launched its Wayfarer e-bike that comes with $277 in FREE gear at $1,899 shipped, after using the on-page code EARLYBIRD300 at checkout. This new model will go for $2,199 at full price once these launch savings end, which is getting a significant $300 markdown that sets the bar for future discounts, while also getting $277 in FREE add-on gear. That gear includes mudguards, a kickstand, and a rear cargo rack to bring some extra versatility. As always with this brand, folks who are medical providers, military, first responders, students, or teachers can receive an extra $100 discounts upon verification.

items.summary:
Razer DeathAdder Essential gaming mouse

Buy for $17 (Reg. $21+)

What we love

The Razer DeathAdder Essential is a popular, no-nonsense gaming mouse that’s been around for a while, and it has a comfortable shape, responsive 6,400 DPI sensor, and durable switches. It doesn’t have any flashy features or even RGB lighting, but it’s known to offer a reliable performance, making it a great pick for gamers who want something simple and dependable for everyday gaming.

items.summary:
Best Buy’s 2025 Black Friday Doorbuster deals are now live, and one of the standout offers drops Samsung’s 49-inch 240Hz Odyssey OLED G9 (G950) gaming monitor to $849.99 shipped. This curved display normally retails for $1,800 and is currently listed for $1,050 directly at Samsung. This model has previously only dipped as low as $1,050 before being replaced by the newer 2025 Odyssey OLED G95SD display, and today’s offer at Best Buy takes $950 off its usual going rate to land it $200 below that price. This is the lowest we have seen this model fetch yet, making this a solid Doorbuster offer that’s hard to beat. This is a great time to cash in and snag it if you have always wanted to buy one of these for your battlestation, and you can learn more about it below.

items.title: adidas early Black Friday Week of Deals sale now live, up to 50% off all your favorites
items.summary:
The adidas Week of Deals sale is live now with up to 50% off sitewide until November 5th. Our top pick has to be the rarely on sale Ultraboost 1.0. These kicks offer energy-returning tech that lets you run mile after mile in total comfort. They deliver traction, flexibility, and cushioning while keeping your feet supported. Plus, they look just as good on the street as they do on your run or at the gym. Score huge deals on all your adidas essentials, perfect for treating yourself or getting a jump on holiday shopping while saving big. Shop the entire sale here.
